solution_line_template: The squirrel steals {squirrel_theft} cup of birdseed every week, so the birds eat {total_capacity} - {squirrel_theft} = <<{total_capacity}-{squirrel_theft}={actual_birdseed_eaten}>>{actual_birdseed_eaten} cups of birdseed.

Each cup feeds {birds_per_cup} birds, so Ivan's bird feeder feeds {birds_per_cup} * {actual_birdseed_eaten} = <<{birds_per_cup}*{actual_birdseed_eaten}={total_birds_fed}>>{total_birds_fed} birds weekly.
